Kevin Yang is a visual designer & illustrator trying to figure out NYC. Currently at DigitalOcean. Formerly at IBM Design. Super Smash Champ at your local Gamestop.

When he's not at the mercy of everyday situations, he spends his time dribbbling, drawing beers, and making things move.

Let's build something amazing together.
